Class ServerMemoryLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • ServerMemoryLogic

  • public final class ServerMemoryLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class shall be used to store information the server needs and or perform calculations or any other kind of operation. Should only have static methods and values.
    Author:
    Felip, Minh

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int[] availableDevelopmentCards
      stores the numbers of still available development cards of each type(we begin with 14 knight cards,2 road building,2 monopoly, 2 yearofplenty,5 victory)
      static int[] availableResourceCards
      stores the numbers of still available resource cards of each type(we begin with 19 each) order: wood, loam, wool, grain, stone
      static java.util.HashMap<ClientConnectionHandler,PlayerForProtocol> clientToPlayer
      Map each ClientConnectionHandler to the corresponding PlayerForProtocol.
      static Resources costsOfADevelopmentCard
      Costs of a development card (1 wool, 1 grain, 1 stone)
      static PlayerForProtocol currentPlayerWithLargestArmy
      The player with the largest army >= 3
      static PlayerForProtocol currentPlayerWithLongestRoad
      The player with the longest road >= 5
      static java.util.Random developmentCardRandom
      random to choose the next development card
      static Dice dice
      Our dice
      static int initialPhaseRemainingTurns
      Indicates how many turns we have to end until we complete the initial phase
      static int largestArmy
      Stores the largest army from the players
      static int longestRoad
      Stores the longest road from the players (Default is 4).
      static int numberOfReadyPlayers
      Defines how many players are ready and willing to start the game (if not already started)
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,int[]> playerIdToAvailableBuildings
      hashmap from players id to all the buildings they can still build (order:street, settlement, castle)
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,DevelopmentCards> playerIdToDevCardsBoughtThisRound
      hashmap from player id to development cards bought this round
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Building> playerIdToSecondInitialPhaseSettlement
      Maps each player id to the last settlement built by the player in the initial phase
      static java.util.ArrayList<PlayerForProtocol> playerList
      Stores all the connected players in an array list who play the game.
      static java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Integer> playersWhoNeedToGiveBackCards
      The ids of player who need to give back cards.
      static PlayerForProtocol playerToMoveThiefNext
      The id of the player to move the thief next (Needed once "numberOfDropHalfCardsPending" hits 0).
      static Map serverMap
      Map of the game.
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> tradesIDHashMap
      A hashmap mapping tradeID to the initial trade requester.
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Resources[]> tradesResourceHashMap
      A hashmap mapping tradeID to the corresponding resources.
